meanings.definition: The state of being happy or content.
meanings.sent1: Her face lit up with hippiness when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: The hippiness in the air was contagious, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent3: The hippiness of the puppy wagging its tail made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The hippiness of a blooming flower can brighten even the gloomiest day.
meanings.sent5: The hippiness of a child's laughter is truly infectious.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being cheerful or joyful.
meanings.sent1: The hippiness of the music lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent2: His hippiness was evident in the way he greeted everyone with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The hippiness of the clown's antics brought laughter to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The hippiness of a sunny day can make everything seem better.
meanings.sent5: The hippiness of a good book can transport you to another world.
